userProfile.reviewEmptyDescription: You haven't written any reviews yet. Start sharing your experiences!

common.emailCollectionExplanation: Please enter your email address to continue. We'll use this to identify your teams and allow you to access them later.
common.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
common.welcomeMessage: Welcome! You can now create and manage your teams.
common.yourTeamsExplanation: Below you'll find all the teams you've created.
common.invalidPin: Please enter a PIN with at least 4 digits
common.enterPinTooltip: Please enter your PIN to continue.
common.registerAgain: Please register again with a new PIN
common.identificationError: There was an error saving your information. Please try again.
common.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already registered. Please use a different email or try to log in.
common.registrationError: There was an error during registration. Please try again.
common.verificationError: There was an error during verification. Please try again.
common.enterPinToVerify: Please enter your PIN to verify your identity.
common.pinResetSent: PIN reset instructions have been sent to your email.
common.pinResetError: There was an error requesting PIN reset. Please try again.
common.teamManagementExplanation: Create and manage teams, track orders, and monitor progress all in one place.
common.orderTrackingExplanation: Keep track of player orders, payment status, and delivery information.
common.credentialSecurityExplanation: Your email and PIN are stored securely and only used to identify you when accessing team information.
common.pinHelperText: Create a 4-digit PIN you'll remember. This will be used to verify your identity.
common.teamManagementIntro: Our team management system helps you organize, track, and manage team collections efficiently. Here's how it works:
common.createTeamsExplanation: Set up teams with custom products, age groups, and collection deadlines.
common.manageOrdersExplanation: Track player orders, payment status, and manage product inventory.
common.trackProgressExplanation: Monitor collection progress, generate reports, and export data.
common.emailPurposeExplanation: Your email is used to identify you and associate you with your teams.
common.pinPurposeExplanation: Your PIN provides an additional layer of security to protect your team data.
common.securityPurposeExplanation: We use secure storage and encryption to protect your information.

currencyInfo.title: Currency Display
currencyInfo.description: Prices are displayed in your selected currency for your convenience. However, all payments are processed in USD.

topHeader.blackFridayDeals: Black Friday Deals – Up to 30% Off Custom Products!

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: Learn more about our company and services

metadata.siteDescription: Customize your products with our B2B platform

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click on the link to verify your account.
verifyEmail.noEmail: If you haven't received the email, you can request a new verification link.
verifyEmail.errorMessage: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again.
verifyEmail.waitMessage: Please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting a new verification email.
verifyEmail.verificationSuccess: Your email has been verified successfully.
verifyEmail.noSessionRedirectingToSignin: No active session. Redirecting to sign in page...
verifyEmail.verifiedDescription: Your email has been successfully verified.
verifyEmail.alreadyVerifiedMessage: If you attempted verification and your email is still showing as unverified, please sign out and sign in again.

form.enterDetails: Please enter your details to sign in.
form.emailOrPhoneRequired: Email or phone number is required.

form.passwordMinError: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
form.termsNotAcceptedError: You must accept the terms and conditions.
form.formError: There were some errors in the form.
form.fillDetails: Fill in the details to create your account.
form.invalidPhoneError: Please enter a valid phone number.  e.g., +923456789000
form.invalidPhoneFormat: Invalid phone number format. Use: Country code + number, e.g., +923456789000
form.formErrors: Please correct the errors in the form.
